<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Document</title>
    <style>
        p{
            color: red;
            font-size: 20px;
            font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
        }

        p.ex1{
            display: none
        }

        p.ex2{
            display: block;
            background-color: lightblue;
        }

        p.ex3{
            display: inline;
            background-color: lightgreen;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <h1>Display Properties</h1>

    <h1>Display : None</h1>
    <div>
        Here The Functionality of display none is demonstrated.None means Nothing will be displayed on the screen.
        <p class="ex1">Hello Display None</p>
    </div>

    
    <h1>Display : Block</h1>
    <div>
        Here The Functionality of display Block is demonstrated.It is similar to a div tag.
        <p class="ex2">Hello Display Block</p>
    </div>


    
    <h1>Display : Inline</h1>
    <div>
        Here The Functionality of display none is demonstrated. It is similar to a span tag.
        <p class="ex3">Hello Display Inline</p>
    </div>
</body>
</html>






<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Document</title>
    <style>
        .products{
            background-color: lightgray;
            display: flex;
            /* Bydfeault flex direction is row */
            justify-content:center;
            gap: 40px;
            height: 300px;
            align-items:center;
        }

        .box{
            border: 1px solid black;
            width: 100px;
            height: 100px;
            background-color: lightcoral;
            text-align: center;
            border-radius: 15px;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="products">
        <div class="box">Cake .</div>
        <div class="box">Cookies .</div>
        <div class="box">Pastry .</div>
    </div>
</body>
</html>




<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Document</title>
    <style>
        body{
            font-family: monospace;
            background-color: #f4f4f4;
            margin: 0;
        }

        h1{
            text-align: center;
            color: #333;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }

        .team{
            display:flex;
            justify-self: center; 
            /* Move the content it always written with display flex */
            gap:30px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            /* Responsive as per screen size */
        }

        .card{
            background-color: bisque;
            width: 220px;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 14px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
        }

        button{
            padding:20px;
            background-color: orange;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 14px;
            cursor: pointer;
            color: white;
            font-size: 16px;
        }

        h3{
            color: blue;
        }

        p{
            color: green;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 20px;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <h1>Meet the Team</h1>

    <div class="team">

      <div class="card">
        <img src="data:image/png;base64,">
        <h3>Ajay</h3>
        <p>Developer</p>
        <button>Linkdln</button>
      </div>

      <div class="card">
        <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">
        <h3>Zainab</h3>
        <p> Backend Developer</p>
        <button>Linkdln</button>
      </div>


      <div class="card">
        <img src="data:image/png;base64,">
        <h3>Arpith</h3>
        <p>UI UX Developer</p>
        <button>Linkdln</button>
      </div>

      <div class="card">
        <img src="data:image/png;base64,">
        <h3>Dev</h3>
        <p> WebDeveloper</p>
        <button>Linkdln</button>
      </div>


    </div>
</body>
</html>
